tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE fashion_inventory (
    item_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    item_category VARCHAR(50),
    item_stock INT,
    item_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE fashion_items (
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    brand_id INT,
    category_id INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (brand_id) REFERENCES fashion_brands(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES fashion_categories(category_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sales (
   sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   item_id INT,
   quantity_sold INT,
   sale_date DATE,
   FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES fashion_items(item_id)
);

CREATE TABLE inventory (
    inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    brand_id INT,
    size_id INT,
    color_id INT,
    quantity INT
);
